actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the tax-exempt interest on certain governmental obligations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that governments issuing tax-exempt securities must not have an income, franchise, or other tax on corporations which includes, as part of the tax base, items of income from sources outside the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the tax-exempt interest on certain governmental obligations.
